PROMPTSETXUI.XUIEDITOR:
<dialog height="506" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="279" top="4" width="420"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Parameters"><properties><entry name="text">Parameters</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SEARCH_FILESETs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Search fileset" tooltip="Defines the name of the fileset to lookup. if you leave empty, all filesets are searched you may specify a full name of a fileset, e.g. bos.rte.filesystem you can use * to indicate wildcards, e.g. bos.rte.*" upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Search fileset</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_SEARCH_FILESETs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Defines the name of the fileset to lookup.
if you leave empty, all filesets are searched
you may specify a full name of a fileset, e.g. bos.rte.filesystem
you can use * to indicate wildcards, e.g. bos.rte.*</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><combo dynamic="0" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DISPLAYs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Entities to display" tooltip="The selection criteria defines what to display. The option defines the name of the entity to look up. fileset: Displays the name, most recent level, state, and a description of the specified fileset. The build date, which is specified by the year and the week in the form of yyww (for example, 0852), is also displayed for a fileset, if it has one. Part information (usr, root, and share) is consolidated into the same listing. For formatted filesets, it displays the most recent maintenance or technology level for the specified filesets. In addition, this flag lists any subsystem selective fixes that were installed on top of the maintenance or technology level. RPM and ISMP images are also listed. (uses the option "-L" at command line) prerequisites: Displays requisite information for the specified fileset. (uses the option "-p" at command line) dependent: Displays filesets that are dependents of the specified software. A dependent fileset is one that has the specified software as a prerequisite, corequisite, ifrequisite, or installed requisite. (uses the option "-d" at command line) installed files: Displays the names of the files added to the system during installation of the specified fileset. (uses the option "-f" at command line) update history: Displays the installation and update history information for the specified fileset. owning fileset: Lists fileset that owns the queried file. (uses the option "-w" at command line)" alt="1" filter="0" strict="1" vtype="i"><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command owner="_self" owneraction="setsource" ownerparam="src|_dialog@src"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptcombolist" target="_self" targetaction="setlist" wait="0"/><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.AUTOMIC_AIX.PRV.VARA.QUERY_TYPE</entry><entry name="text">Entities to display</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DISPLAYs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">The selection criteria defines what to display. The
option defines
the name of the entity to look up. fileset: Displays
the name, most recent level, state, and a description
of the specified fileset. The build date, which is specified
by the year and the week in the form of yyww
(for example, 0852), is also displayed for a fileset, if
it has one. Part information (usr, root, and share) is
consolidated into the same listing. For formatted filesets,
it displays the most recent maintenance or
technology level for the specified filesets. In addition,
this flag lists any subsystem selective fixes
that were installed on top of the maintenance or technology
level. RPM and ISMP images are also listed.
(uses the option "-L" at command line) prerequisites:
Displays requisite information for the specified fileset.
(uses the option "-p" at command line) dependent:
Displays filesets that are dependents of the
specified software. A dependent fileset is one that
has the specified software as a prerequisite, corequisite,
ifrequisite, or installed requisite. (uses the
option "-d" at command line) installed files: Displays
the names of the files added to the system during
installation of the specified fileset. (uses the option
"-f" at command line) update history: Displays the
installation and update history information for the
specified fileset. owning fileset: Lists fileset that
owns the queried file. (uses the option "-w" at command
line)</entry><entry name="dynamic">0</entry><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></combo></readpanel></dialog>

PROMPTSETDATA.DATAEDITOR: <PRPTS ontop="1"><PRPTBOX><UC4RB_SEARCH_FILESETs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_SEARCH_FILESET#" ReadFromTable="OPSE"></UC4RB_SEARCH_FILESETs.00><UC4RB_DISPLAYs.00 haslist="0" msgnr="-1" msginsert="" altview="0" promptname="UC4RB_DISPLAY#" ReadFromTable="OPSE">fileset</UC4RB_DISPLAYs.00></PRPTBOX></PRPTS>
